a large open area just inside the entrance of a public building such as a theatre or a hotel, where people can wait and meet each other: in the foyer I'll see you downstairs in the foyer in half an hour.
mustafagull/E+/GettyImages
US (UK hall) the room in a house or apartment leading from the front door to other rooms, where things like coats and hats are kept
